attraction_reviewComments: Very nice venue to enjoy a great night of Stockton Heat Hockey! Nice selection of vendors who offer a variety of different things to eat and drink. Great family fun.

Hockey was amazing!!! I went with my Nephew and this was his first time going to a hockey game! We had a blast.
Went to see a hockey game with the new Stockton Heat team. Great game with a great team. It was nice to see them win as well.
